data.name: NetSpace Saga Ep.1
data.detailed_description:
When the crew of the Black Coffee Class C Transport ship finds themselves with no cash and no fuel, they have to ask for work from an old, unpleasant acquaintance, which unchains a series of events that will change the fate of the Solar System, making them unlikely heroes.

Fight your way against aliens, zombies, robots, androids, AI's, sicarios, and more while meeting hundreds of characters in the Asteroid Cities, vInternet (a Virtual Internet that has gone mad), and Deep Space. Rescue three girls in danger and learn Satan's true name, while uncovering a terrible conspiracy.

Features of Episode 1:

  • A modern take on classic gameplay!
  • Turn-based Battle with Adventure elements, just like the JRPG gems of the past!
  • An irreverent story with characters you will never forget!
  • Save anywhere!
  • More than 70 unique enemies!
  • Meet hundreds of characters!
  • 10 or more hours of gameplay!
  • 4 or more hours of hilarious side quests!
  • A dark, cyberpunk soundtrack by The Krundas!
  • More than 40 levels!
  • You can connect to vInternet almost anytime with the Deck and explore!
  • Use Chips to learn new abilities!
  • Episodic story!

data.short_description: A Space Noir Turn-based Battle JRPG homage of old-classics. In this irreverent story, you follow a crew of Space Truckers as they try to survive in a world of aliens, zombies, robots, androids, the Space Cartels, and terrible secrets, in and out of a virtual Internet that holds its own mysteries.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 2 cores 4 threads
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 710, Intel UHD Graphics 620 or similar.
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 2 cores 4 threads
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1030 or similar
  • Storage: 8000 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. Characters and dialogues are irreverent and may make fun of sensitive subjects, like homosexuality and gender. The use of drugs is present throughout the game. Sexual content, general mature content.
